doc.field: This dataset depicts the areas of the Transitwayl boarding platforms. The geography was created referencing CAD drawings for the Northstar platforms and by heads-up digitizing platforms for the Hiawatha Light Rail platforms

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><title>Transitway Platforms</title><origin>Metropolitan Council</origin><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>20130717</pubdate><onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/TransitwayPlatforms.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This dataset depicts the areas of the Transitwayl boarding platforms. The geography was created referencing CAD drawings for the Northstar platforms and by heads-up digitizing platforms for the Hiawatha Light Rail platforms</abstract><purpose>To have a general depiction of the Northstar Commuter Rail platforms.</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington.</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20130717</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Data is current as of listed date above</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As Needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-93.729981</westbc><eastbc>-93.246157</eastbc><northbc>45.331911</northbc><southbc>44.980625</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Twin Cities, Hennepin County, Anoka county, City of Anoka, City of Coon Rapids, City of Fridley, City of Elk River, City of Big Lake, Sherburne County, Anoka County, City of Minneapolis</placekey></place><theme><themekey>Commuter rail, Northstar, stations, light rail transit, Transit, transporation, buses, bus rapid transit, BRT</themekey><themekt>None</themekt></theme></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><browse><browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/TransitwayPlatforms.jpg</browsen><browsed>Sample map showing the NorthstarCRTPlatforms layer.</browsed></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title>Transitway Stations, Transitway Alignments</title></citeinfo></crossref><native /><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Rachel Wiken</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Specialist</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1572</cntvoice><cntemail>rachel.wiken@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>The attribute reflects station names provided on http://www.northstartrain.org/ .</attraccr></attracc><logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic><complete>Entire corridor is covered.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy. The dataset was created by identifying approximate station locations referencing CAD files as well as head-up digitizing</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>The dataset was created by using heads-up digitizing and referencing CAD drawings.</procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref>None</indspref><direct>Vector</direct><mgmg3obj>arcs</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>One tile for entire dataset.</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><eainfo><overview><eaover>ATTRIBUTES:
Station : The name of the station.
Direction: The typical directionality of the train when stopping at the platform.
Type: Transitway type (commuter rail, light rail, bus rapid transit)
Name: Route name
Transitway: Name of transitway (blue line, red line etc..)
PlatformID: A unique identification number of each platform</eaover><eadetcit>None</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><resdesc>TransitwayPlatforms</resdesc><distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.</distliab><stdorder><digform><digtinfo><formname>Shape file</formname><formvern /><transize>Less than 1 Mb for zip file.</transize></digtinfo></digform><ordering>This dataset is distributed on the internet by clicking below after 'Online Linkage'. Doing so will tell your browser to download a 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:
- ArcView shape files - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.
Additionally, this dataset is available for direct use via one or more map services. More information about what a web mapping service is can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/services/. The specific map service and layer name for this dataset can be found by clicking the blue or green boxes under the map service column of the DataFinder Catalog at http://www.datafinder.org/catalog/ .</ordering></stdorder><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib></distinfo><metainfo><metd>20130717</metd><metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn><metstdv>1.2</metstdv><metextns><onlink>http://www.gis.state.mn.us/stds/metadata.htm</onlink></metextns><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></metc></metainfo><Esri><ModDate>20110721</ModDate><ModTime>14550900</ModTime></Esri><mdDateSt Sync="TRUE">20110721</mdDateSt><spref><horizsys><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>Universal Transverse Mercator</gridsysn><utm><utmzone>15</utmzone></utm></gridsys><planci><plandu>meters</plandu></planci></planar><geodetic><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn><ellips>GRS80</ellips></geodetic></horizsys></spref></metadata>
